attributes.action: Ensure Tony Blair and Alistair Campbell are prosecuted under International Criminal Court Act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On completion of the Chilcott inquiry there must be a judicial review on Tony Blair and Alistair Campbells part in the unlawful War on Iraq. Can you please confirm this will be the case

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
